summary: This module implements the Solovay‑Kitaev algorithm for synthesizing arbitrary single‑qubit unitaries as sequences of gates drawn from a finite universal basis. It provides a class that loads pre‑computed elementary approximations, builds lookup keys, and recursively decomposes target gates into a gate sequence suitable for the Qiskit transpiler. The file also contains a few helper utilities that are currently unused.
business_intent: Allow quantum circuits to be compiled for hardware with a limited native gate set by automatically converting any single‑qubit operation into an equivalent sequence of basis gates, thereby improving compatibility and execution fidelity on real quantum devices.
